description: A dark luxury landing page for Voltage Ink, a fictional fine art tattoo studio in East Los Angeles specialising in UV-reactive neon inks and custom irezumi. Near-black background with electric pink, cyan, and violet neon accents. Features a 6-panel image grid hero, portfolio grid, 5-step commission process, and booking form.
